item.title: 📄Build your own RAG @mesudarshan highlights a great stack for RAG: 🦜LangChain as framework 🟦@UnstructuredIO for data prep 🚄Fastembed for e...
item.description:
📄Build your own RAG

@mesudarshan highlights a great stack for RAG:

🦜LangChain as framework
🟦@UnstructuredIO for data prep
🚄Fastembed for embedding
🦀@qdrant_engine as vectorstore
🦙Llama3 via @GroqInc

Video: https://youtu.be/m_3q3XnLlTI

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🦜🕸️ LangGraph.js web support 🦜🕸️ You can now use @LangChainAI's LangGraph.js in more environments! We’ve added a new `web...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🦜🕸️ LangGraph.js web support 🦜🕸️

You can now use @LangChainAI's LangGraph.js in more environments!

We’ve added a new `web` entrypoint that allows you to build stateful, agentic apps even in a web browser.

Check out the guide below to try it out:

https://langchain-ai.github.io/langgraphjs/how-tos/use-in-web-environments/

item.description:

item.title: It's easier than ever to build online evals in LangSmith. You can now use any structured prompt from the LangChain Hub with customizable variables. Yo...
item.description: It's easier than ever to build online evals in LangSmith. You can now use any structured prompt from the LangChain Hub with customizable variables. You can personalize your inputs based on recent runs to match your schema. Happy prompting!

LangChain users can now import capabilities from Elasticsearch, which includes a flexible retrieval system and vector database.

item.description:
🔓 LangSmith is now HIPAA compliant! 🎉

We're excited to announce that LangSmith — our unified developer platform for building, testing, and monitoring LLM applications — is now HIPAA compliant. Security and compliance is important to us and to our growing list of enterprise…
